lender.name: Katie
lender.occupational_info: I'm a university student studying Biology and Bengali.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I believe that there is more good that can be done with my extra money than to buy something else I dont need. Though many of us dont have much to give... I like to help where I can... and this is a GREAT cause. Empowerment of the world's people. We can all make a difference... and it doesnt take much. What isnt much to us, means the world to these people. Im thrilled to be a part of something so worthwhile and to be given the chance to do something for the rest of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a hotel, checking people in, cleaning laundry, serving.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I care!
lender.occupational_info: I design buildings and their interiors. I also design graphics and logos for marketing purposes.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: Every morning as I listen to the radio on the way to work, I hear stories of men and women who struggle to earn money to support themselves and their families. Every time I hear one of these stories, I realize how lucky I am to live where I live and have the opportunities that I have - especially as a woman and a business owner. I've often wanted to be able to send money directly to those individuals to help them achieve their dreams. When I found out about Kiva, I realized that here was a way I could do exactly that - to send money directly to real people. I'm excited to be a Kiva lender and I hope to participate in the program for many years to come!
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer. Professionally, I photograph weddings and portraits. Personally, I photograph anything and everything. I am fascinated by different cultures and customs, by history, and by people. I consider what I do to be as much a calling as a career - to document peoples' lives so that their children and their grandchildren will have those images and memories to share for generations.

lender.name: andrew
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Sometimes just the tiniest bit of help can make all the difference.
lender.occupational_info: I provide a win/win situation for myself and my client by utilizing my vision and talents to create and build what my clients desire.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I like to make investments that can improve others' lives as well as my own.... and I can.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I can and want to help

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: I know what it feels like to know that if you only had a little help, you could accomplish anything.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small tea import business selling fresh, gourmet teas and over 10,000 other worldly drinks. I also own a technology & business development firm helping others start their own businesses using technology to help make operations more cost effective and streamlined.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I support female entrepreneurs, feminists, and women making a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I direct plays and provide behind-the-scenes support for theater and opera.

lender.name: Ed
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner that got my start with a US SBA loan, want people with less opportunity to have the same help.

lender.name: Per
lender.loan_because: It goes direct to needy people who need the help. Not greedy fat bankers!
lender.occupational_info: I work on alternative energy and here in Thailand I am involved with developing alternative energy like wind and bio-gas. We need funding for a demo project for the unit shown in the picture and we are seeking USD 3,000 for first installation.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: I want to empower my self as well as others to see the positive things in the world. If everyone was selfless instead of selfish, there would be no negativity. If I can a little of myself to someone in need, I have done a good a deed as one can do. Fifteen percent of my income is 100% of someone else and it would only be wasted on frivolities, why not help a fellow human being. :-)
lender.occupational_info: I work in a local fast food restaurant as a manager. It is not the world's most glamourous job, but I find happiness there.

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: I believe in the goodness of people.
lender.occupational_info: Social Entrepreneur/Innovator

lender.name: Shireen
lender.loan_because: I believe in people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at The University of Florida! I am an English major with a minor in International Humanitarian Assistance, going Pre-Med. In other words, I like to write, I want to help people, and I hope to become a doctor someday. =)

lender.name: B & S & V
lender.loan_because: As a business owner I know how difficult funding can be in my country, it would be impossible elsewhere.
lender.occupational_info: I do the book work for small businesses.

lender.name: Jesus and Mehruba
lender.loan_because: we can

lender.name: Albert
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have the means to afford college (and an expensive one at that!) so it is only right that I help others less privileged in the hopes that one day, they can return the favor to someone else.

lender.name: vanessa
lender.loan_because: I want to do my small bit to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am unable to work due to illness.

lender.loan_because: I loan
lender.occupational_info: I am going to school to learn to be a pharmacist. I am currently applying to pharmacy school.

I want to share the love of Jesus with other people. I pray that God our Father will bless you abundantly and that you will know the love of Jesus Christ.
Yo quiero compartir el amor de Jesus con otros. Rezo que Dios nuestro Padre te bendiga abuntantemente y que conozcas el amor de Jesucristo.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.loan_because: Don't just talk about change, make it happen...
lender.occupational_info: I am working in an office, analysing financial numbers to make the company more efficient and effective.

lender.name: Timo

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I believe that every bit helps and from little things big things grow.

lender.name: Alistair
lender.loan_because: i believe that small sums of money can make a very big difference if they get to the right people.

lender.loan_because: I am happy to share when and where I can.

lender.loan_because: All my life I have been extraordinarily blessed with a wonderful family and rewarding career. I am giving back a miniscule amount compared to what I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: I am now a contract employee, helping 8th graders pass their state math exams.

lender.loan_because: i learn and speak a lot about inequality so it is time to do something in the real world using one of the advantage of globalization.

lender.loan_because: was a good thing to do

lender.loan_because: I teach my AP Geography students about micro loans - we learn by doing so we did.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high level classes in World History and Geography to teenagers. It is the best job in the world

lender.occupational_info: We take care of peoples pets, in their home, while they are away at work or on holidays.

lender.loan_because: why not? I just want to do my part.
lender.occupational_info: It might be described as boring by my girl-friend but i like it.

lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I care for my husband and son. I shop, prepare meals, clean the house and drive my child to and from his activities.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate by Holly and family - I think this is a wonderful way to make a small difference.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I'm passionate about helping create a global economy based on wellness, love, joy and service, where money flows freely to all. By lending to small business entrepreneurs in developing countries and helping them to thrive, I feel that I thrive, too!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Business Coach & Prosperity Guide who helps alternative healers to grow their businesses and empower themselves financially.

lender.name: Anders
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are worse off than me. I know being a Norwegian is a privilege and that I should help people when I have a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure everybody is ok and that they are following the laws. Almost like a policeman, but without the rights that a policeman has.

lender.name: Armin
lender.loan_because:
The essence of faith is fewness of words and abundance of deeds. --Bahullh

lender.loan_because: I believe women should help women. I believe in educating women to help them make better informed decisions.
lender.occupational_info: I help people help themselves through financial education.

lender.loan_because: Investing in people is an honor that we are proud to be a part of.

lender.loan_because: I have traveled the world and seen much poverty. I hope my loans will help families and individuals improve their living conditions.

lender.loan_because: Give to others so that they may have the opportunity to lead full, productive and happy lives

lender.name: Manal
lender.loan_because: I believe in human potential and hope.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Kiva really does help and it is not charity. The best thing you can do for someone is help them earn a living.
lender.occupational_info: I help people forced to leave their country because of war to start new lives in the United States.

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: It's one small way I can pay something back to the world in a meaningful, sustainable way.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and create businesses to give me income so I can help other people.

lender.name: joe
lender.loan_because: I care,and I like to help other people.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: My aunt introduced me to this amazing website, giving me $50 as a Christmas present. It has probably been one of my most favourite Christmas presents of all time, as those $50 become a gift that keeps on giving more and more each time I get repaid. It's truly an amazing and profound experience.
lender.occupational_info: I am actually still a student, but it is my last year of high school. I do have a part-time job, where I work during the evening and weekends as to avoid school hours and give me a break now and then. I work in a restaurant as a rather versatile employee that is slowly learning all the things one can do in this restaurant.

lender.loan_because: I like to help others. :)

lender.name: shortandsweetbakery
lender.loan_because: Everyone is entitled to a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Just a hometown bakery hoping to help out someone. Eat local, think global.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I am a businessman and I understand it takes "seed" cash to launch any new business. I want to help people launch their new ventures and provide a small opportunity for progress.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office at least 40-50 hours per week.

lender.name: Lloyd
lender.loan_because: I believe that happiness should be shared with other people. Thanks for helping me to help you.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher at a high school.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: My grown daughter performed some volunteer efforts in Bwera, Uganda and got me started with Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I organize, sort and prepare reports on financial transactions by month and year.

lender.name: Yutaka
lender.loan_because: I want to help peole who are working hard for their family.

lender.name: Eileen L
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is one of the most effective ways to provide opportunities for people to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs for a company that makes infant wear.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I loan because we have to always have hope. Not only for what we want for ourselves, but what we want for the world as well. Both of my businesses are struggling now because of our economy, but that makes it even more important to reach out and help others achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I have two businesses. One is an eco-lodge with five suites where people can stay on vacation and enjoy the Great Smoky Mountains National Park, www.timberrose.com. I also make angel jewelry, www.alpinebeadworks.com

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much, and giving to these people helps me remember all that I have. I love to know that the money I have worked for is working for others as well. GO KIVA!

lender.name: Vaishnavi
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting businesses and productive activities. I am also thrilled to finally have the opportunity to help people across the globe from my living room.

lender.name: Cary Hopper
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone microeconomically start a business

lender.name: Barry Pope
lender.loan_because: I want to help those that are working to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I manage medical information systems.

lender.name: Mr & Mrs Jeff Barker
lender.loan_because: If we have the money now and lone it out, then when we really need it, it shouold be paid back. And, we like taking care of others.
lender.occupational_info: My husband cleans city buildings and I take care of the house.

lender.name: Nate
lender.loan_because: I have an interest in microfinance and international development. Kiva helps me learn while at the same time enabling me to help entrepreneurs around the world.

lender.name: Jan and Ben
lender.loan_because: It is such a simple way to make a substantial difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to show support for other women.

lender.occupational_info: I buy clothing and other merchandise from manufactures to be sold at a department store.

lender.name: lisa
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel useful. such a small amount of money can change people's lives significantly.
lender.occupational_info: we try to help non profit organizations continue to do the great work that they do, helping to improve the quality of people's lives.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur. I am a woman. I am privileged to live in a wealthy country. I loan because I want to help other entrepreneurs succeed and make life easier for them.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a free-lance writer of proposals, marketing, editing for organizations, companies and individuals.
I'm also an art photographer and am very passionate about my work.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I have grown up in financial security all of my life. There is no need for me to keep my resources to myself. If just a small amount can help someone around the world start a public service organization or trade, I feel I would be crazy not to participate.
lender.occupational_info: I live and work in a home for four adults with developmental disabilities. I assist them with their daily needs, including social and spiritual development.

lender.name: Hector

lender.name: Tony

lender.occupational_info: I am a student at university. I will one day help others as a therapist.

lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.

lender.loan_because: Sometimes all it takes is a little capital to make a business go.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I think that it is important to support other's dreams; I like to be a part of helping others make things happen, even if only in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I help students discover their course of study to lead to a job they will enjoy and do well.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I get so much enjoyment from knowing I helped in some small way for an individual half way around the world to create a better life and prosper.

lender.name: Rupert
lender.loan_because: I believe if we are in a position to help others, we have an obligation to do so. We in the western world can, so I do. Microcredits are the best way to help people to manage their own lives selfdeterminated.

lender.name: Caitlyn
lender.loan_because: This site was brought to my attention in a class called Questions Of Social Justice, where I have to do a project on the UN's goals by 2008, where my research topic was to Develop a Global Partnership for developing, and I have choosen to do more hands on research and to help this goal be completed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student attending a womens college where I am studying music, business, and communications. I plan to attend law school after I complete my undergraduate. I work at the museum of fine arts, where I help people with computer issues and make sure that the video equipment in the galleries are functioning properly.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference directly to individuals in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am raising three children to be good citizens and stewards of the world. Even though they are young (all 5 years and under), they are active in their church and their community.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it easy for the user and seeing the real-world impact is really humanizing.
lender.occupational_info: I film and edit videos for HowStuffWorks.com.

lender.name: Willem Brocker
lender.loan_because: it supports enterpreneurship and impacts life.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I want my children to see that no matter how small the gesture, we can still make a difference in our world.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: The loan can continually be reinvested in others after it is repaid. So, it's a great way to make a little donation to help many people!
lender.occupational_info: I analyze data for research about how social forces influence individual lives.

lender.name: Esme
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Nora
lender.loan_because: I am lucky that I can afford to, and because I believe that actions to improve the lot of individuals and local communities are what ultimately improves society as a whole.

lender.name: Mike
lender.occupational_info: The work I do as an engineer is a blessing from God!

lender.name: Madeline
lender.occupation: Residential Aid at W.P. School for Blind Children

lender.name: Tobias
lender.loan_because: I like to help others so they can help themselves.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: Everyone should get a fair chance, and this is my way of making that possible

lender.name: Adam Kogeman
lender.loan_because: no person is an island...every person deserves equal opportunities and when one succeeds, we all benefit.

lender.name: Francesca
lender.loan_because: I have been the recipient of several loans in the US already, so I know what a difference they can make!

lender.name: Yvan
lender.loan_because: it's good to help people helping themselves to reach a better living standard rather than assisting them
lender.occupational_info: I am a fundraiser in a large international NGO supporting children and their communities to reach a sustainable developement

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: We are all trying to do good and make a difference in our corners of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a scientist working on DNA sequencing, and especially on using technology to fight disease. I am also an entrepreneur, trying to start my own business.

lender.name: The Carter Family
lender.loan_because: We loan because we would like to influence as many lives around the world as possible.
lender.occupational_info: Our work is that of helping Families and Children live better lives.

lender.name: Pelle
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Kristopher
lender.loan_because: I believe the wealth and values of our country should be spread throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I build and operate hotels.

lender.name: sharon
lender.loan_because: I like the idea and it's something I can easily do to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I used to teach, but now I am retired. I do volunteer work and travel extensively now.

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: I'd like to give other people a chance to do something for themselves. The loan values are small to me, but can make a big difference to people who have to struggle more than I do.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.occupation: Vice President of Retail, Cato Oill Company
lender.occupational_info: I oversee the operation of my company retail division, which includes 11 convenience stores and 15 quick serve restaurants.

lender.name: Kirra
lender.loan_because:
Then the King will say to those on his right, "Come, you who are blessed by my Father; take your inheritance, the kingdom prepared for you since the creation of the world.
"For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you invited me in, I needed clothes and you clothed me, I was sick and you looked after me, I was in prison and you came to visit me."
Then the righteous will answer him, "Lord, when did we see you hungry and feed you, or thirsty and give you something to drink? When did we see you a stranger and invite you in, or needing clothes and clothe you? When did we see you sick or in prison and go to visit you?"
The King will reply, "I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me."
Matthew 25: 34-40
lender.occupational_info: I represent people who are victimized by large corporations or other individuals.

lender.name: Susan and Ken
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Tim & Ken
lender.loan_because: It makes a clear and visible difference.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I think this a great idea.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: "We are all pencils in the hand of God. " --Mother Teresa
lender.occupational_info: Enrolling in grad school... very soon!

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: there is a bigger purpose on this planet that still needs to be found.

lender.name: Kwip
lender.loan_because: I'm a terrible, horrible person and I'm just trying to buy good karma...
lender.occupational_info: I sit in a cubicle all day and stare at a poster of a sailboat on choppy seas and imagine what it would be like to have such adventures.

lender.name: Sarah Andreano
lender.loan_because: Offering financing to entrepreneurs allows indivduals to raise their living standards and give back to their local community.
lender.occupational_info: I strive to offer exceptional products and service to my customers. Having solid financial resources has allowed us to thrive for over 100 years.
